title: Is Zelda: Breath of The Wild 2 ACTUALLY Next-Gen? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 04.13.22
description:
Blessing and Janet reignite Switch Pro theories with BOTW sequel speculation, discuss a mystery Bandai Namco game, and more.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:06:33 - Housekeeping

There’s a new Kinda Funny Podcast up right now and it’s a farewell and remembrance of Portillo. You can watch that right now on Youtube.com/kindafunny and on podcast services around the globe.

The Roper Report  -

00:07:05 - Is Zelda Breath of The Wild 2 ACTUALLY next-gen?
00:23:05 - Bandai Namco appears to be making an HD remaster of a Nintendo game
00:31:31 - Ads
00:33:40 - Oddworld: Soulstorm’s director claims that their PS Plus deal was devastating
00:47:03 - Aspyr is acquiring Beamdog
00:50:24 - A California Lawyer has Quit Over an Allegation that Governor Gavin Newsom Meddled in the Activision Case
00:56:31 - Sony and Nintendo are updating their subscription guidelines
01:01:34 - Out today
01:02:16 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Janet & Tim
